post:
Hello,

We have been in the web hosting business since 2009, providing budget friendly cPanel & Linux hosting solutions.

http://www.rosenhost.com http://www.rosenhost.info

**Why choose RosenHost?**

* We are a small business but we will do our best to help you. I know many people here are pretty experienced with VMs and web hosting environments. If you know what you are doing and just need a cheap cPanel hosting account, our services might be a good choice for you.
* We are in business **since 2009** and we do not have any intention to go away. You can see our offers on WHT and similar locations for a long time.
* We work hard to keep our servers clean. We take our network very seriously. Abusers and spammers are never tolerated.
* Absolutely no risks on buying from RosenHost. We provide **14 DAYS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE**. If you are not satisfied with the service, you simply get a refund by opening a ticket to our sales team.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please check our **upgraded** LET Exclusive cPanel powered web hosting plans. Annual payments are encouraged to get advantage of better pricing.

### LET SPECIAL PLAN

* Softaculous / awstats /webalizer / SMTP-POP3/
* **2 GB** Space
* **50 GB** Bandwidth (was 30)
* 50 FTP Accounts (was 10)
* 50 Email Accounts / Lists (was 10)
* 50 mySQL Databases (was 10)
* 50 Subdomains
* 10 Parked Domains
* **10 Addon Domains**
* Lets Encrypt included on cPanel (LU only)
* Dedicated IPs available (CO only)
* Ability to change PHP version
* Located in Colorado, USA or Luxembourg, EU.

**$0.99/mo or $3.99/Year**

[Order USA](https://secure.rosenhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29) | [Order Europe](https://secure.rosenhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=30)

Colorado Test IP : `64.111.24.104`

Luxembourg Test IP : `107.189.3.147`

*Please feel free to try our services. **We provide a "no questions asked" money back guarantee for 14 days**. 

*This plan is useful for bloggers, small businesses, low traffic web sites and applications. Feel free to direct any questions to

`support@rosenhost.com`

* Our uptime information is public and can be seen below;
* http://uptime.statuscake.com/?TestID=QhTQFtLC7B
* We do not provide live chat support. Average ticket response time is 3 hours.
* If you need **bigger plans or a different location** such as Los Angeles or United Kingdom, please see our secure client portal located [here](https://secure.rosenhost.com/cart.php)

Regards,
